name: Puppet's Play
description:
Dance to amaze your audience before they get bored and leave!

  • Character movement mechanics remembering real-life puppets movement;
  • Theatrical theme presenting a puppet show;
  • Audience patience management.

Instructions:

  • Drag and drop the tabs above the puppet to move him;
  • Make your audience happy before you run out of time.

College project made with Construct 2 in 3 months.
